attribution: הספרייה הלאומית, אוסף המפות ע"ש ערן לאור
label: An exact map of the Crim (Formerly Taurica Chersonesus); Part of Lesser Tartary, the Sea of Asoph, and the adjacent Country of the Kuban Tartars; as laid down by the Czarina's Geographers; exhibiting the March of the Russian Armies against the Crim Tartars, in the war begun with the Turks 1736, and continued the present Year 1739.

metadata.label: Title
metadata.value: An exact map of the Crim (Formerly Taurica Chersonesus); Part of Lesser Tartary, the Sea of Asoph, and the adjacent Country of the Kuban Tartars; as laid down by the Czarina's Geographers; exhibiting the March of the Russian Armies against the Crim Tartars, in the war begun with the Turks 1736, and continued the present Year 1739.
